job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: 100% remote, Contract to Hire, W2 onlyThe #1 online wine retail store desires passionate Site Reliability Engineers who are fascinated with improving the customer experience by helping them discover great wines from all over the world.Envisioned yourself yourself joining the team? Cheers, innovators!Top Skills' DetailsAWS Cloud – setting up cloud formations, security groups, cloud watch metricsTerraform & KubernetesAutomation/CM with Ansible and Chef-Python Coding requiredResponsibilities will include, but not be limited to:Development of new applications and tools to automate key portions of our production infrastructureDevelopment of solutions for the automation of system provisioning and deploymentResearch and implementation of new monitoring systemsDevelop and deploy new tools for the automation of configuration management processesBuild internal tools for centralized infrastructure management
